meanings.definition: A quadrilateral with at least one pair of parallel sides.
meanings.sent1: I drew a trapezoid on my math homework.
meanings.sent2: The building had a trapezoid-shaped roof.
meanings.sent3: The trapezoid on the chalkboard looked like a lopsided house.
meanings.sent4: Her smile formed a trapezoid of happiness on her face.
meanings.sent5: The trapezoid in the picture was as clear as day.

meanings.definition: A geometric shape with four sides, only two of which are parallel.
meanings.sent1: The trapezoid in the book was colorful.
meanings.sent2: The playground had a trapezoid structure for climbing.
meanings.sent3: The trapezoid cookie looked like a delicious math problem.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a trapezoid of conflicting thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The trapezoid puzzle piece fit perfectly into the gap.
